hero.title: Global Supply & Export Solutions
hero.lead: MFROOSH is a leading and reliable company specializing in the supply and export of high-quality agricultural commodities. The company connects farmers and producers with local, regional, and international markets through professional and efficient supply chain solutions.has extensive experience in agricultural supply chain management and is committed to applying the highest standards of quality and food safety at every stage  from crop selection to sorting, packaging, and final delivery in line with client requirements.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: Highest standards of food safety and quality control at every stage—from selection to final delivery.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: Transparent operations and ethical business practices in all transactions.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.desc: Dedicated to sustainability and operational excellence in every transaction.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.desc: Building trusted relationships with farmers, suppliers, and buyers.

continuousDevelopment.title: Continuous Development
continuousDevelopment.desc: Ongoing investment in people, processes, and technology to improve service quality.

about.heading: Leading Agricultural Supplier
about.visionText: To become a regional leader in agricultural commodity supply and export, and a trusted partner for farmers and buyers worldwide.
about.missionText: To provide premium agricultural products that meet diverse market needs, while maintaining transparency, sustainability, and operational excellence.

service1.title: Supply and export of agricultural commodities

service2.title: Sorting, packaging, and labeling according to market standards

products.title: Our Products
products.heading: Premium Agricultural Commodities
products.description: Sourced from the finest farms and suppliers, delivered fresh to markets worldwide

Peanuts.name: Peanuts
Peanuts.description: premium-quality peanuts with high oil content, widely used in the food industry
Peanuts.uses: Ideal for snacking, baking, and producing peanut butter.

Sesame.name: Sesame
Sesame.description: High-quality sesame seeds with high oil content and excellent purity, suitable for food industries and export markets.
Sesame.uses: Used in baking, as a topping for salads, and for producing sesame oil.

Arabic Gum.name: Arabic Gum(Hashab -talha)
Arabic Gum.description: Pure natural gum arabic used in food, pharmaceutical, and cosmetic industries.
Arabic Gum.uses: Used in food as a stabilizer, in pharmaceuticals, and in lithography.

Hibiscus.name: Hibiscus
Hibiscus.description: Dried hibiscus flowers, offering a unique tangy flavor and vibrant color.
Hibiscus.uses: Perfect for making teas, beverages, and as a natural food coloring.

Adasya.name: Adasya
Adasya.description: Carefully selected lentils, suitable for food production and consumer markets.
Adasya.uses: Commonly used in soups, stews, and various traditional dishes.

Watermelon Seeds.name: Watermelon Seeds
Watermelon Seeds.description: High-quality watermelon seeds suitable for snacks and various food applications.
Watermelon Seeds.uses: Can be roasted for a healthy snack or pressed for oil.

Peanut Cake.name: Peanut Cake
Peanut Cake.description: Protein-rich peanut cake widely used as high-value animal feed
Peanut Cake.uses: Primarily used as a high-protein supplement for livestock.

Frankincense.name: Frankincense
Frankincense.description: Natural frankincense gum used in incense, traditional remedies, and various industries.
Frankincense.uses: Burned for its aromatic properties, used in traditional medicine, and in perfumery.
